name: Nineroll: The Machineball
description:
🐄 Have you ever played Nineroll? 🐄

Get ready to roll your ball around amazing worlds at full speed!

Move forward with your ball, get lots of gems and avoid the traps to explore different worlds: visit the Witch's Forest, the arid desert, the frozen biome, the space and others...! 

You can exchange your gems for new balls, complete the collection and get them all. Platforms will be created randomly, everything will be constantly changing!

🐄 FEATURES 🐄

- Languages: English, French, Spanish, German and Catalonian.

- Different gamemodes! (Survival, Adventure...)

- It's Free! There aren no forced ads!

- Unlock achievements and complete dozens of missions.

- Improve your skills to advance much further and obtain a large amount of gems.

- Aumented Reality mode added to take pictures of your collection in real life!

- Win gems to unlock rewards and get new balls!

🐄 Are you enjoying Nineroll? 🐄 

Facebook: facebook.com/nineroll

Instagram: instagram.com/ninerollthemachineball

Webpage: https://nineroll.es/

Google Play: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.VisarianGames.NinerollTheMachi...

Any questions? Contact us at: visariangames@gmail.com
